Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are among one of the promising technologies for efficient and clean energy.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SOFCs offer several advantages over other types of fuel cells under relatively high temperatures (600 degrees C to 800 degrees C).
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the thermal behavior of SOFC stacks at high operating temperatures is a serious issue in SOFC development because it can be associated with detrimental thermal stresses on the life span of the stacks.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The thermal behavior of SOFC stacks can be influenced by operating or material properties.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Therefore, this work aims to investigate the effects of the thermal conductivity of each component (anode, cathode, and electrolyte) on the thermal behavior of samarium-doped ceria-based SOFCs at intermediate temperatures.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Computational fluid dynamics is used to simulate SOFC operation at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The temperature distributions and gradients of a single cell at 0.7 V under different thermal conductivity values are analyzed and discussed to determine their relationship.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Simulations reveal that the influence of thermal conductivity is more remarkable for the anode and electrolyte than for the cathode.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Increasing the thermal conductivity of the anode by 50% results in a 23% drop in the maximum thermal gradients.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results for the electrolyte are subtle, with a similar to 67% reduction in thermal conductivity that only results in an 8% reduction in the maximum temperature gradient.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effect of thermal conductivity on temperature gradient is important because it can be used to predict thermal stress generation.
Titulo: Influence of Thermal Conductivity on the Thermal Behavior of Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
